entry.title: Notes on installing ubuntu 12.04
entry.content:
On a crappy old laptop that I bought back in 2005 for $300-ish.

Installing 12.04 LTS went smoothly until when I rebooted the machine as the last step of installation. Then it hung, and stopped responding after spittinh this error. [ 48.753669] b43-phy0 ERROR: Firmware file "b43/ucode5.fw" not found [ 48.753687] b43-phy0 ERROR: Firmware file "b43/ucode5.fw" not found [ 48.753698] b43-phy0 ERROR: You must go to http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/...devicefirmware and download the correct firmware for this driver version. Please carefully read all instructions on this site.
